description.value: When employing the Shadowing special use of the Stealth Skill, Character can use their Fellowship Characteristic instead of Agility.

system.benefit: When employing the Shadowing special use of the Stealth Skill, Character can use their Fellowship Characteristic instead of Agility.

specialAbilities.name: Blend Into Crowds
specialAbilities.description: When in crowds or public places, become virtually unnoticeable. Others have -20 to Awareness tests to spot or recognize you.
